reviewText: I thought the video would have shown more basketball oriented drills. Conditioning drills that I could incorporate into our practices that would be game type simulated.

This program really assists & sharpens your skills & technical handling, body positions, offenses & defenses, drills, obstacles course with use of cones / chairs. I'm sure this invests on serious basketball players (children or adults), will improve in their games. Remember, all about developing the skills & having fun.
